name: Enter the Gungeon

files.game: N/A: Plese select the GOG.com Linux installer

execute.description: Extracting game data, it will take a while...

content:
exe: Game/start.sh
files:
- game: 'N/A: Plese select the GOG.com Linux installer'
installer:
- execute:
    args: $game -d "$GAMEDIR" "data/noarch/*"
    description: Extracting game data, it will take a while...
- rename:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Game
    src: $GAMEDIR/data/noarch
